vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ματταθά, ὁ
indecl. (Heb. מַתַּתָּה),
Mattatha: Luk.3:31.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.31;
son of: Nathan (H5416);
father of: Menna (G3104)
§ Mattatha, "gift"Mattata
Mattatha, (Proper name), indeclinable; Lk. 3:31*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪達他 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "所賞賜的"
耶穌基督的祖先之一 (路 3:31)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛达他 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "所赏赐的"
耶稣基督的祖先之一 (路 3:31)
